name: Ghop (Nouvanity)
description:
Ghop, or godot hop ( please help me find a better name :) )

This is a bhopping strategy game based off counter strike and the like. I will be posting the source code soon. The game is very much in a early stages. I'm still relatively new to game development so i am learning as i go.

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to jump

R to reset

ESC to quit game

Known issues -

Options menu sliders jump around based off the number
